name: KnowThyCustomer
description: This app integrates with the KnowThyCustomer service to implement investigative actions

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
Gets the attributes of a user
actions.verbose:
You can enter any of the following valid combinations to generate a person report:
  • first_name, last_name, address
  • first_name, last_nname, phone
  • first_name, last_name, address, phone
  • bvid

example_values: Parameter combination validations failed. Please see the action documentation to get a list of valid parameter validations
